org.corfudb.universe.universe

Interface Universe

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractUniverse, DockerUniverse, ProcessUniverse, VmUniverse

    public interface Universe
    A Universe represents a common notion of a universe of nodes. The architecture of a universe is composed of collections of Groups and Nodes. Each instance of service in the universe is composed of a collection of Nodes which are a subset of the entire nodes included in the universe. Universe configuration is provided by an instance of UniverseParams.

    The following are the main functionalities provided by this class: DEPLOY: create a Universe according to the Universe parameters. SHUTDOWN: shutdown a Universe. Depending on the underlying deployment this might translate into stopping the Node-s and/or shutting down the network.
